name: otpstset
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: -| wceq(c2, ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c3), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), c0), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), c4)))
bodyPretty: ⊣ c2 = { <(Base ` ndx), c3 >, <(TopSet ` ndx), c0 >, <(le ` ndx), c4 > }

stmt.origin: strfv(c0, c1, cts, c2, cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c0, cfv(cts, c2)))
-| wbr(c2, cstr, cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat0)))
-| wceq(cts, cslot(cfv(cts, cnx)))
-| wss(csn(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), c0)), c2)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 =(TopSet ` c2))
⊣ c2[Struct]< 1, cdc(1, 0)>
⊣ TopSet = Slot((TopSet ` ndx))
⊣ { <(TopSet ` ndx), c0 > } ⊆ c2
